dc_description_s: This point shapefile contains the locations of classification yards and major switching facilities used in California's rail yards to separate cars onto multiple tracks. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data created by the California Department of Transportation (Caltrans).This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.
